description: This API provides access to teacher training course data, allowing consumers to search and retrieve information about teacher training courses across England.
overview:
The Teacher Training Courses API enables external systems to access and integrate teacher training course information. It supports querying courses by various criteria including location, subject, and provider.
[API documentation](https://api.publish-teacher-training-courses.service.gov.uk/docs/)
usage: Publicly available API for accessing teacher training course data.

releases.name: Version 1.0
releases.notes: Initial release of the Teacher Training Courses API with full course search and retrieval capabilities.
